website_summaries.verdict: Priced in the mid-range, this versatile unit offers owners a satisfying degree of control over their inhalation experience.
pros: Cool enough to be placed directly on the face

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for singers
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best steamer I’ve used. I’m a broadway performer currently touring the US in the National Tour of Les Miserables. I use the steamer at least 2-3x a day. The steam I get is in good quantity. The housing is easy to clean and I like the extra tray for adding essential oil. Even if this just lasts me a year it’s well worth it. I’ve used other steamers and I would buy this one again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift Card You

customer_reviews.title: Water gets scalding hot, no temperature control
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product for one big reason. There's no way to regulate the temperature of the steam. When I placed my face up against the face shield, as instructed by the manufacturer, it felt like I was breathing in scalding water. The inside of my nose burned for quite a while afterwards. I'm so thankful I didn't let a child use this. Another bad thing is the design of the unit. If you fully extend the arm, the bottom of the unit will topple over. The only good thing I can say is that I liked that it had a longer electrical cord. But that wasn't enough to keep the thing from being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dreams Unwind

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The tank is a pain to get to and too small. The drain tank fills rapidly (why is a drain tank even necessary--this is the first steam inhaler I've ever had that required that feature). The aromatherapy tank is nice, but it's necessary to empty the drain tank quite often and you usually end up losing most of you aromatherapy liquid along with the water you're dumping. The steam is too hot and there's no temperature control. The "variable steam control" doesn't seem to control much of anything. I'm looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sukie Tawdry

customer_reviews.title: Best thing on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this inhaler in preparation for Coronavirus, if we get it. I picked a cold a few days ago, and started using this. I told her, this is the best thing she bought on Amazon. It's like a mini steam room for my nose. It can get hot, but I realized it's how I'm breathing it and out. That controls it from getting to hot on your nose. Definitely worth the money, and you will get a better nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy it.....it burst while my 7 year old was taking steam inhalation. Fortunately, no harm was done to him as he was seated faced away from the device...it is of a very poor quality.....
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: poor quality - burned out too quickly. [BEWARE!] Mabis doesn't accept returns
customer_reviews.text: I wish the quality was better. Mine is burned out and is no longer working. I am not a frequent or heavy user, maybe only 3-4 times per year. Mabis do not want to accept it as returned item. "Item cannot be returned". Amazon staff were gracious to offer me a refund but it was a one-time exception for me, probably because of the holidays and because I am a prime member who spends A LOT of money on Amazon every year.
customer_reviews.author: FastTraffik

customer_reviews.title: Works great! A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 month old who was congested for over a week. Used it the first night and she woke up cleared ! She enjoyed putting the mask near her mouth and nose. Lol. I also used it for the first time due to a sinus headache. Did the treatment and 15 minutes my headache was gone. I'm going to be ordering 2 more for family members. No more messy steamed up bathrooms anymore! Great product! Please read instructions for use. 2 small tanks, one for steam drainage and the other for oils.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Trimmer

customer_reviews.title: I have terrible sinus headaches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Feb. 10, 1918. It lasted until today, March 19, 2018. It won't turn on. It won't work. Now I am without an inhaler. I need one every day. The previous one lasted 5 years.. I have terrible sinus headaches, and I need an inhaler I can depend on to work.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Shortt

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This one start cracking the second day of use. Now it is down to almost nothing, but it still work at least. I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brunson

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this product. So far, it does what is suppose to do. I took the top off the unit and unscrewed the purple lid and filled the container with water to just below the five vents. After the water starts boiling, I breathed in very deeply and slowly. Afterward, it gives me hours of relief. I don't know if everyone will get the same results as I, but so far, I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Two uses and broke
customer_reviews.text: After two uses it stopped working. While it worked it was good, but very disappointed that it only lasted for two uses.
customer_reviews.author: D.Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: perfect for sinus congestion and sinus infections!
customer_reviews.text: I am a family practice physician and I have photocopied this page to head to my patients for the perfect sign a steamer. I would like it if it came apart a little easier to add water, but there is simply no other product on the market that is as good as the Manis personal steamer. Especially valuable for those people who can’t or won’t use a Neto pot, with results that are if anything superior to sinus rinsing with saline. This used to be a goodbye for $50 and now the price has come significantly down which makes it affordable for everybodys Budget
customer_reviews.author: CAPT RW Hanson, USN (ret)

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1 use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is July and used it once. I thought it was great. I just plugged it in to use again (January) and the red light went off after 2 minutes and it won’t turn back on no matter what I do. It died. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID SHAIN

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted six weeks!
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. Stopped working about 6 weeks after purchase. It helped a lot with sinus pain and improved the appearance of the dark circles under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: megafish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because ok excessively high pollen in Texas at this time. assembly is quick with easy to understand instructions. My son had a "pollen" headache so he used this nebulizer for 5 minutes. No headache today. Effective, plus we can add aromatherapy essentials when we choose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Can't return it.
customer_reviews.text: The light came on briefly. Doesn't work. I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: milann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect,exactly for COVID-19 period
customer_reviews.text: I'm really so happy that I got it. Its small miracle. Perfectly works. I got it cause I started to feel that I'm getting sick....and so dangerous for coronovirus period.... So I got this inhaler,plus oil for aromatherapy (for breathing problems). I can't explain how I'm happy about it!!! I was using steam inhaler 2 time per day,plus I was drinking tea (from ginger,lemon,lime and honey),and before going to sleep I took Nightquil. So it's help.
customer_reviews.author: Grigoriy

customer_reviews.title: This will burn your face!
customer_reviews.text: I got this 2 years ago I had not used it since then as I had sinus surgery and I didn’t need it. Now my sinuses are all backed up got this out. I cannot even put this near my face with out it burning me. I would not get this and especially for your children as this is a disaster waiting to happen!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great----for a while, then rusty steam is what  you get
customer_reviews.text: I have COPD and the congestion is unbearable. I hadn't slept more than 20 minutes in a row for several months, the very first day this machine steamed away the congestion and I slept all night. After a while, a few months, the reservoir keeps filling with dark water, loos like everything is rusted.and unhealthy to use. I have been afraid to use it for some while. Having COPD is bad enough, inhaling rusty steam is definitely on the list of things to avoid. Spend a few more $$ and buy one that's going to help.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Steam too hot to handle and boiling water sputters and spills over to burn to skin
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Water heats very fast and starts producing steam within a min or two. The Bad: 1. The steam coming out is very hot even at the low setting and if the nose is rested the way it is shown on the pictures it will burn the skin 2. The water sputters and often boiling water spills over burning your face... 3. The aroma compartment is good but not very effective specially when you are using essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: rusang

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mucus
customer_reviews.text: I have been to many doctors and tried all different kinds of neti pots from the standard to electric pulsating. I thought I'd give the inhaler a try, what could it hurt. I have been using it for 3 days now and I notice about an 80% improvement in my post nasal drip with mucus. It's easy to use and I get a steam facial at the same time. Haha Not sure the more I use it, will I keep improving, I hope so. I breath in through my nose and also my mouth since other reviews mentioned both. Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: burns the lips
customer_reviews.text: The steam is way to hot for the lips, and the mouth/nose piece is way to small to exhale through the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon man

customer_reviews.title: Unit FAILED exactly 41 days from purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to see that Amazon no longer has this piece of junk in their inventory. My unit quit working exactly 41 days from date of delivery! Though the unit was very easy to use and clean, the fact that the unit doesn't power on with less than two months use is unacceptable. And OF COURSE, the window for return closed the day before the unit quit. Great timing!
customer_reviews.author: Fin

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this no stars. I used it a grand total of three times before it stopped working. It's probably just as well that it no longer works, as it blasts eye-watering steam uncontrollably and blows through the water in its tiny reservoir in no time flat. Don't waste your money on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my daughter uses it after running in cold air to help keep her vocal cords and throat healthy. She was noticing a difference in her voice after track practice and this has made a huge difference in that. She hasn’t used the essential oil part but this was the best deal we found on a throat steamer. Non of the local shops had one
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just Incase if coronavirus. Turns out my whole family got the virus, and we used this every day! Extremely thankful! We all made it out ok. I think the nebulizer was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Britt

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and does seem to help with my allergies/chronic cough if I use it regularly. I notice my cough comes back if I go for several days without using it. Even if I am using my allergy medications too. Lots of the personal steam vaporizers are so expensive, but this is really reasonably priced. I haven't used the essential oil option, but I think that's a nice idea too. Other reviewers say that they wish it lasted longer, but I am so bored out of my mind by the end of the 10-12 min., I can't imagine sitting there for much longer!
customer_reviews.author: chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and recommended but this actual device is not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I love the result of using this device, it has made a definite improvement in our health from breathing the oil vapors. However, this device is difficult to work with, and is falling apart quickly (leaking/cracking etc.). I anticipate needing to buy a new one soon, which is pretty discouraging seeing as I have only owned this for a handful of months and have probably used it 20 times.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Hempster

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product because EVERYONE in my family suffers from allergy related sinus and breathing problems and because of COVID-19 we were experiencing troubles getting our OTC sinus meds and other breathing related products......AFTER 1 (one) use (except for initial cleaning prescribed in the owners manual) the unit melted that's right I said MELTED it was used for less than 2 (two) minutes then unplugged I do not recommend this product what so ever .......VERY UNHAPPY AMAZON CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Will

customer_reviews.title: Great for me and my kids when they're sick
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use especially with my kids when they're sick. I usually boil water and inhale the steam if I have bad colds. I also do that to my kids. I made a long tube that goes from the pot that gets close to the nose to inhale steam - ok for an adult, risky for a kid. But this personal inhaler does the same job without having that risk of tipping over the boiling pot of water! Also this is portable that I can bring it when travelling. it only has a small reservoir so expect that you have steam for a little more or less thank5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: kilawin

customer_reviews.title: TOO HOT and cannot return! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works as described but it is TOO HOT!!! My husband who sits in the sauna on a regular basis, cannot tolerate.It and neither can I! You also cannot return it even if defective!!!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy pursuit

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was missing the measuring cup & it burns your face when you use it. I tried to return it the same day received but it says it’s not eligible for return. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joni Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for one month, then it didn't
customer_reviews.text: we bought this last February 2019 and both used it and loved it, thought it worked great. We cleaned and put it away until this February, when we got it out and nothing. All it would do is the light would go on, then three minutes later the light would turn off and no steam, nothing. I would have hoped it would have worked for more than one month.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Does It's Job Well
customer_reviews.text: It differently helps with congestion and everything. However it wouldn't hurt if the machine was just a little easier on my wallet. Cleaning it is a bit of a hassle since nothing is disposable. Other than that, its very simple to use, just plug and play. With CoViD-19 going around, this sure makes it a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers/singers who love essential oils.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I am a teacher and singer so I use my voice all day long. I love that you can put in your own essential oils so I'll do different blends for different purposes, like immunity and relaxation. Follow the instructions on water level and drain the little water catcher every time. This is very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: EspritLyrique

customer_reviews.title: Did not even work once
customer_reviews.text: This item was defective. I didn't get to use it even once. Followed all instructions. Orange light came on for a second then not again. Tried unplugging and plugging it back in then turning on and nothing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: HAS A STRANGE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I had one before that was gifted to me but it fell a couple of times and didn't work that well anymore. I bought a new one and it works the same but has a strange odor that wasn't present in the first one I bought so I don't use as much. I would have given all stars if not for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old has really bad night time allegeries
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old has really bad night time allegeries. So bad that it seems like Puff the Magic Dragon sleeps here (smile). Nightly, I loose sleep because I'm worried about him coupled with feeling bad and scared because it sound like he was suffocating (went to the doctors). Sinus and allegergy meds was the, recommendations/fix. They provided some relief. Not my 1st remedy choice. Purchase Mabis and after 1 8min session he was breathing clearly and peacefully slept through the night. Awesome apparatus; easy To operate .
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Logan

customer_reviews.title: Dependability
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work at all. after the machine plug in to electric outlet, the indicator light on machine came on for few seconds and disappeared and never generated steam to inhale. I talked to Amazon for return but was refused due to COVID-19 issue. so, as of today we have no choice but to throw this machine. so, beware before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samir R Desai

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: After using for 3 months the tumbler turned white. Not durable
customer_reviews.author: sri g

customer_reviews.title: couldn't open aromatherapy/drain tank
customer_reviews.text: It worked well a few times but then aromatherapy/drain tank became stuck and couldn't open it. Therefore could not clean that part and could not add essential oils to the mist as device is designed to do. Had to return item.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sampson

customer_reviews.title: I Waited too Long to Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I used a cheap steamer bought years ago at an HMO pharmacy and used it until it died. Had I tried this one at anytime I would have thrown out the former one and bought one of these immediately. These are wonderful and don't burn you with the steam released. They have an adjustable amount of air to add to the steam by extending the outlet pipe and allow air to enter. This steamer helps greatly with sinus related issues to expedite rapid recovery with minimal need for other forms of treatment. Bottom line is that everyone--repeat everyone should own one of these or have access to one of these to be prepared for periodic sinus related flareups and issues.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hovander

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us and can't return
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old said it was too hot and wont use it. Biggest problem is that this is a non refundable item, so if you get it and it doesn't work then it is an expensive paper weight, so make sure you are comfortable with talking the chance on it being a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stancel

customer_reviews.title: Right Out Of The Box
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. Read the instructions. Filled the chamber. Plugged it in. After 1 minute the light goes out. Nothing. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Devi8tor

customer_reviews.title: Leakage
customer_reviews.text: The led light died after one use. Steam is ok, but a lot of hassle to set up. Leaking all the time. Cannot tell if the unit is on or off. Only by listening! Very stiff power cord. Flaky on off switch. The tiny tab on the top cover breaks off after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: ton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second steam inhaler from Mabis, the first one lasting me over 5 years. I have horrendous allergies and sinuses so this has been a must have for me. I use it in the morning and right before going to bed, and this helps to keep me breathing a lot better. I highly recommend this product for anyone with sinus or breathing problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yung

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful steamy healing and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is a life saver for me, to help eleviate my symptoms of bronchial asthma. I resently used with tea tree, menthol, and mint oil in water in the resevor designated for that use, and shortened my last cold to just a couple of days, while my other family members who did not use the steamer were misserable for more then a week.
customer_reviews.author: PLG

customer_reviews.title: Mabis Steam Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this steamer because while I can hold the bowl with hot water and put the towel over my head my kids ages 8, 6 and 4 can not. This steamer works great for all three of them. I used it during allergy season added some aromatherapy and it was quick and easy with noticeable results- about 6 minutes to complete. My only complaint is that when I use the aromatherapy I don't have anywhere to store the little measure cup and it has gotten misplaced a few times. We have also started to use it during cold season.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNKS

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Item worked great for the first few times and then just wouldn't turn on anymore. Ended up having to throw it away. Seems like spending money on higher end steam inhaler is worth it after all. Would not recommend this if you need it on a regular basis for asthma or allergies. Spend the extra bucks on a better quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: product broke in less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I only used this product 6 or 7 times in two months and now it is broken and doesn't turn on. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Stern

customer_reviews.title: Works well I like it
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well if you have a stuffy nose but need to clear up especially if you have chronically stuffy noses in your household. It's a small machine that doesn't make a lot of noise and that's great, and it's also a good value for the money. You can achieve the same thing this product does by putting a towel over your head and holding your face over a pot of boiling water and inhaling the steam that comes out. But this option is much better in that you don't have to get hot or have your face get burned.
customer_reviews.author: David Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It has helped me a lot with the flu, sinus headaches and sinusitus. It would have gotten 5 stars if there was a control on the heat but I got used to it by just moving my face a few inches away from the face nozzle. I almost didn't purchase it because of a review a read about it being to difficult to open to hetvto the water reservior. The trick is to place product facing you, place hand on top of device with thumb on the press to release part of the device. That is the easiest way to do it. I Would recommend to this product.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I have tried everything. I filled it with water, plugged it in, flipped the switch, and waited, but nothing worked. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steam inhaler
customer_reviews.text: The steam inhaler arrived on time and well packaged. It’s easy to install and use. Need to be cautious with the hot steam coming out when opening up for cleaning. I use steam inhaler few times a week, nose felt much better after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously hot do not buy no refund...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Steam is scalding. Have to be very careful. When the water runs out you get a scalding hot puff of steam. Light steam burns on my upper lip. Says NO REFUND. Going to see if they'll take it back anyway. Wish I had read reviews first. You can tell customer reviews vs fake corporate reviews.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful to me.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this inhaler now for the past few months since I bought it on September. My first purchase was MyPurMist but it just didn't turn on. So I got this item and it worked right away. I followed the instructions and the device worked within a few seconds. The steam is pretty hot at times, but manageable. I have not tried this item with scented oils as I've only used it with just water. I used it to help me clear up congestion and also when I had laryngitis. It was very helpful to loosen the mucus and phlegm!
customer_reviews.author: S. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Vapor too hot
customer_reviews.text: We tried to used it in many ways, read the instructions but the vapor is too hot and burns our skin.
customer_reviews.author: Letícia P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I had been dealing with what started as a Sinus Infection mostly with Pressure. I tried saline rinse, saline spray and nelli pot. Nothing was helping. I then purchased this inhaler. Wow......what a difference steam makes!!!! I used this twice a day for 3 days and instantly the pain was gone. I have to admit I was a bit hesitant. However, this was a great investment. One other note. As I was inhaling through my nose...I was also getting a great facial. This steamer puts out some steady HOT steam.
customer_reviews.author: 1 special rose

customer_reviews.title: Kept from going into pneumonia
customer_reviews.text: My husband had bronchitis without relief. Bronchitis was getting worse, and doc's didn't have an answer how to prevent it from going into pneumonia. Purchased the MABIS inhaler and used collidal silver. Saw positive results in less than 48 hours. This is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: EB Gold

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and I really love it, helps with my nasal congestion and associated headaches. Warm mist heat is soothing and I get a facial along with nasal relief. Don't use often but it has stood up to my use.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Nice thought but......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. His nose is usually stuffed due to allergies. He tried it for ten days straight with absolutely no relief, not even temporary relief. We were both disappointed. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Daysgobydsr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use as directed..Will burn your face
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine as long as you don’t use as directed. If you put your face in the mask, prepare to have your face/throat burned. Besides the steam being WAY too hot, it ‘spits’ occasionally...which means boiling hot droplets hitting your face. I stay a few inches away from the mask...but I still jump each time it spits. I think it gave me ptsd! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Rosa D Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Helped Me!
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly stuffed up and congested after a bout with the flu and this little machine, along with "Healing Solutions Breathe Blend" essential oil, cleared me up in just 3 uses! By the way, have a box of tissues handy, because this WILL loosen up and get rid of ALL of the gunk and restore your sense of smell. Incredible little device and well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work as advertised. It does not explain that not all essential oils can be used. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband had viral infection and severe cold and cough. I ordered this product and within 3-4 days of use my husband felt relieved from cold. This steamer is easy to use as well as to clean. It's very handy too. And definitely very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I have invested in. It really works great clearing up congestion, helps with throat, good for facials. Overall it’s a good steamer and east to use
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Used it 4 times. Broke. Almost scalded my face because the face mask no longer worked. No steam, just a rush of hot water. Don't buy this. I'll look at Novage.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Smells plastic when you inhale. Wouldn't be surprised if I get cancer using it for a year or so. I would smoke a cigarette and get cancer than inhaling plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Roopesh Kumar Krishna Kumar

customer_reviews.title: i couldn't believe how wonderful this this steamer works open my stuffy sinuses head ...
customer_reviews.text: This, wow i use it one time, i couldn't believe how wonderful this this steamer works open my stuffy sinuses head in one use. i just set my on the table next to my bed and just let the stem blow to my face. this work real good for the size. although you do have to be careful if you want to put your face in the face cup.. the steam can to hot for your face so be careful and use with caution, It work just that good.
customer_reviews.author: Cs

customer_reviews.title: and compared with that this is infinitely better. It's portable so I'm not glued to a ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't compared this to other models. I've previously inhaled steam over a boiling pot of water, and compared with that this is infinitely better. It's portable so I'm not glued to a stove, & have worry about burns etc. I'd imagine any portable model that doesn't build up bacteria should all serve the purpose. Background info: I get URIs & sinus infections easily if I don't play enough tennis. (Exercise is worth it's weight in gold for prevention). I've had a septoplasty.
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Tap

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: A produces lot more steam compared to the Vicks. Some people may complain that it is too hot. I thought the temperature of the steam is perfect and also safe. I wish filling the water tanks was easier. It does not come with a face mask. You don't need the face mask for the sinus steam therapy. I would have liked to have it though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rand

customer_reviews.title: Bad manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my sinus, in two months the top cap which holds the water does not screw on properly. Hence, the steam is lost and the product does not work. I called customer care they tell me that it is under warranty but I need to pay a 'shipping' fees of $20! I got it for $28 and now I need $20 to replace it when it is their fault! No thanks! This one has been tossed in the trash :(
customer_reviews.author: VJ and. CJ

customer_reviews.title: Helps with sinus headache
customer_reviews.text: Got this for family member who suffers from sinus headaches. Got some relief using this. Aromatherapy drawer is what attracted me to this. Put peppermint and eucalyptus oil in it to aide in relief for headache. Will purchase another so they may take it with them when not home. Would like that it came with face mask or ability to purchase on amazon as opposed to manufacturer website. And as others have noted for price these inhalers cost, a bit more plastic at base to raise it up off table.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Broadway singer and am very fussy with my steamers. I was looking for something that had more oomph than my previous (Vicks) steamer. I am so indebted to my (also Broadway singer) friend who suggested this! There is SO much steam, it heats up quickly, there is a separate compartment so you can add some essential oils (I love lavender and eucalyptus), and it is so easy to clean. Plus, it's so affordable! A+ product. Will probably order a second one; one for travel/work and one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Helpful for Sinus Issues
customer_reviews.text: My son & I have sinus congestion & allergies. This little steamer is great! Easy to use, works fast, and offers relief. Great Product we'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a singer and musicotheater major in college. This was at the top of her Christmas list to have. It was a must have and loves after multiple performances to add relief for her vocal chords.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I have been buying steam Inhalers one a ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have been buying steam Inhalers one a year for years looking for just the right one. The search is over. This steam inhaler is perfect in every way. Sort of odd looking but very functional and it's aroma therapy cup is fantastic. I cannot find anything to criticise and I am a very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Effective, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far, but I am happy with it. It is one of the few steamers that allow you to use therapeutic oils with it. It has warmer steam than my old on which cost 4 times as much. I also like the small end piece because it does not get my hair damp like a pot of boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, which obviously you can not return. Poor quality, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul_Sh

customer_reviews.title: Failures
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth steamer that we have purchased and all of them failed. The first one lasted 6 months the third one only a month and then this last failed in one week. When they failed they all became very hot and spit water out. Don't waste your money on them. We contacted the company for any modifications that could be made to put them back in service but were just told contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: duck

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommand
customer_reviews.text: For the last few years I have had one sinus infection after another so I started looking for a good vaporizer and I came across this one and the reviews were very good so I ordered one and I am a happy camper. I love it. I was so tired of getting sinus infections and I started looking for a good vaporizer and I came across this one. I love it. The reviews were very good. Now I am a happy camper. It even stops my sinus headache.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Scott

customer_reviews.title: way too hot, the steam is way too hot, burn my nose
customer_reviews.text: way too hot, the steam is way too hot, burn my nose return! DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Eirc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The machine is easy to use. Useful product for clearing nasal passages, and can also be used as a facial steam machine. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene W.

customer_reviews.title: Short circuited / stopped working on first try
customer_reviews.text: I think the product needs to be recalled. I plugged it in, and within 30 seconds there was a burning smell and then the unit turned off. It would not turn on again after that. Amazon were great and gave me an immediate refund but I've read lots of reviews that say the same thing. I don't think this product is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Delzene

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money
customer_reviews.text: The steam from this machine is VERY HOT!! Actually too hot to use for sinus relief!! Tried returning this item and it is an item that cannot be returned. So be sure this is what you need or want before you purchase it. Wasted money!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for personal steam item that I could add my essential oils to this one one is perfect for that, really helps open sinuses
customer_reviews.author: pas-indi

customer_reviews.title: returns not allowed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for what I wanted. The box has not been opened and they will not allow a return
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Grady

customer_reviews.title: Very little output
customer_reviews.text: So weak that it puts out very little steam and holds such a small amount of water that it only steams for a few minutes before it is totally useless. We returned this item and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned on for 30 seconds then stopped. I should have listened to the other reviewers. Thank you Amazon for giving me a refund!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Works good, easy to clean, easy to use. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better inhalers out there, nothing crazy but it's easy to clean, vaporizes well and works very good too.
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: this product is not a good inhaler
customer_reviews.text: I used this inhaler twice. and attempted to use a third time and it would not work. I seek ways to return no options. I will call amazon
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Speedy recovery worth it
customer_reviews.text: If your under the weather or allergies or build your immune system please get this works like a charm water and essential oil or collaidel silver worth it speedy recovery
customer_reviews.author: Michele  Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: Having severe allergies and sleeping do not mix. Always the big glops of crud coming down out of the sinuses choking me waking me up. It was torture. Now with ten minutes on this machine just before bedtime and I sleep like a baby. What a blessing. And it is easy to use and simple to clean up and put away. I just take it apart and put it into the dish drainer for the next day. By then it is dry and can be assembled and stored. It is a bit pricey but worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Really Effective and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It Really worked to help me get rid of lung congestion, by just adding a little Eucalyptus & Tea Tree Oil to the scent container.
customer_reviews.author: PaPa Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Must have for singers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our daughter who is a singer who does Broadway tours and theater runs. She uses this between acts and she says it helps her throat not to hurt and dry out when she's doing so much singing. It helps clear her sinuses too. According to her, it's a must have for singers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after half dozen uses
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 4-5 stars if it continued to work, because when it did it was awesome. But I only used it a small handful of times and it has already died. A $35 product should last more than 5 or 6 uses. Do not buy this product unless you like to shell out big bucks for disposable items over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work!!!?
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn’t heat up at all...faulty! And can’t return...guess I’m stuck with it and no help for my asthma!!
customer_reviews.author: Shir

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, so easy!
customer_reviews.text: Glad we chose this! We watched a you tube video to make sure we were using it properly. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I needed something quick to help preserve my voice over an extended run of a musical I was performing in. This was perfect. I'm going to order another so that I can have one for home and one for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Contessah I. Davis

customer_reviews.title: good in a pinch but dries you out
customer_reviews.text: I dont' feel like it cleans easy so I am concerned about getting bacteria in my sinuses. But also, I feel like it dries my sinuses out.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

product_meta.title: MABIS Personal Steam Inhaler Vaporizer with Aromatherapy Diffuser, Purple and White
product_meta.description:
MABIS PERSONAL STEAM INHALER, STEAM VAPORIZER

Warm, Soothing, and Natural Relief You Can Rely On

YOUR STEAM VAPORIZER IS GREAT FOR:



 * Respiratory ailments
 * Common cold
 * Sore throat
 * Cough
 * Allergies
 * Flu
 * Laryngitis
 * Bronchitis
 * Sinusitis
 * Asthma



PERSONAL STEAM INHALER BENEFITS



 * Relieves throat irritation and inflammation
 * Cleanses pores
 * Rejuvenates skin
 * Relieving respiratory ailments
 * Operates quietly



STEAM VAPORIZER FEATURES:



 * Soft, latex free, flexible mask
 * Extension tube
 * Drain tank
 * Aromatherapy tank
 * Indicator light
 * Measuring cup
 * 5 foot power cord for convenience



MABIS PERSONAL STEAM INHALER, STEAM VAPORIZER SPECIFICATIONS:



 * 4 by 9 by 10 inches
 * Weighs 4 pounds
 * Latex free
 * Made of plastic



WARRANTY AND GUARANTEE:



 * Amazon Exclusive Limited warranty may apply. Please see product for additional details.



Click Add To Cart Today!

DIRECTIONS
Place Humidifier in an area that is out of the reach of children. Humidifier may not work properly on a non level surface. Always place Humidifier on a firm, flat, level surface, at least 5 inches away from walls and heat sources such as stoves, radiators or heaters.

When moving, or lifting the Humidifier make sure you have a secure grip under the Base of unit. When removing the Tank, use one hand on the Tank Handle and the other on the bottom of the Tank on the Fill Cap. This will help prevent leakage of water or breakage of the unit itself. Before using the Humidifier, extend the cord and inspect for any signs of damage. Do not use the product if cord has been damaged.
feature_bullets: YOUR PERSONAL STEAM INHALER NATURALLY AND EFFECTIVELY HELPS RELIEVE respiratory symptoms of the common cold, sore throat, cough, flu, laryngitis , bronchitis, sinusitis, asthma, and allergies

ADJUSTABLE FILTER FREE STEAM CONTROL WITH AROMATHERAPY TANK makes it easy for you to control the amount of steam your steam vaporizer produces while enhacing your experience with pleasant scents of your choice

YOUR STEAM VAPORIZER IS A GREAT NATURAL EXPECTORANT, which increases the amount of and clears secretions, lubricating your respiratory tract. The inhalation of steam significantly benefits your lungs and throat

INCLUDES EVERYTHING YOU WILL NEED AND OPERATES QUIETLY: A soft, flexible mask, extension tube, drain tank and aromatherapy tank, indicator light, measuring cup and 5 foot power cord. Plus, your steam vaporizer will operate quietly without distracting or unpleasant noise

WARRANTY AND GUARANTEE: Amazon Exclusive Limited warranty may apply. Please see product for additional details. Note: we can only guarantee the quality of this product when sold through Amazon.com or Brazos Walking Sticks

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
